movie_title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
title: Bring on Bruno!
review: Bravo....Bring on the Bruno Movie! been watching Sasha for some time now since the UK days but I have to admit I was suspect on how this movie would be put together and quite frankly I was pleasantly surprised.Genius.... I was amazed that HBO actually realized the success and ran the marathon during the release of this movie.Bravo on their behalf as well.'...Women cannot vote, In my country it come a Man.. A Sheep.. A Rat and then a woman and maybe something else...'HIGH Five!!
